Package stincmale.ratmex.meter

Contains tools for rate measuring.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConcurrentRateMeterStats
    Stats gathered by a thread-safe implementation of RateMeter which implements RateMeter.tick(long, long) in a relaxed way, that allows come ticks to be registered at an incorrect instant for example.
    LockStrategy
    A lock abstraction which allows implementations with different semantics, e.g.
    LongArray
    An array abstraction which allows implementations with different semantics.
    RateMeter<S>
    A utility that measures a rate of ticks by counting ticks in a moving time interval.
    TicksCounter
    A counter of ticks that can be used by RateMeter implementations.
    WaitStrategy
    An abstraction which allows implementations of different approaches to block on a condition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNavigableMapRateMeter<C extends ConcurrentRateMeterConfig>
    This is an almost complete implementation of AbstractRateMeter which only requires a correct parameters to be provided to the constructor.
    AbstractRateMeter<S,C extends RateMeterConfig>
    A generic implementation of a configurable RateMeter.
    AbstractRingBufferRateMeter<S,C extends ConcurrentRateMeterConfig>
    This is an almost complete implementation of AbstractRateMeter which only requires a correct parameters to be provided to the constructor.
    AbstractTicksCounter
    An abstract TicksCounter, which is a good start for a TicksCounter implementation.
    AtomicLongTicksCounter
    This TicksCounter uses AtomicLong field to store its value.
    AtomikLongArray
    This concurrent implementation of LongArray is just a wrapper over an AtomicLongArray.
    ConcurrentNavigableMapRateMeter
    A thread-safe implementation of AbstractNavigableMapRateMeter, which uses ConcurrentSkipListMap implementation of NavigableMap (this might be changed in the future).
    ConcurrentRateMeterConfig
    A configuration that can be used to create concurrent implementations of AbstractRateMeter, e.g.
    ConcurrentRateMeterConfig.Builder  
    ConcurrentRingBufferRateMeter
    A thread-safe implementation of AbstractRingBufferRateMeter, which uses AtomikLongArray implementation of LongArray (this might be changed in the future).
    LongAdderTicksCounter
    This TicksCounter uses LongAdder field to store its value.
    LongTicksCounter
    This TicksCounter uses plain long field to store its value.
    NavigableMapRateMeter
    A not thread-safe implementation of AbstractNavigableMapRateMeter, which currently uses TreeMap implementation of NavigableMap (this might be changed in the future).
    ParkWaitStrategy
    This implementation of WaitStrategy combines exponential backoff and parking.
    PlainLongArray
    This sequential implementation of LongArray is just a wrapper over a plain long[] array.
    RateMeterConfig
    A configuration that can be used to create AbstractRateMeter.
    RateMeterConfig.Builder  
    RateMeterReading
    A modifiable RateMeter reading.
    RingBufferRateMeter
    A not thread-safe implementation of AbstractRingBufferRateMeter, which uses PlainLongArray implementation of LongArray (this might be changed in the future).
    SpinLockStrategy
    This implementation of LockStrategy does not distinguish shared and exclusive locking.
    StampedLockStrategy
    This implementation of LockStrategy uses StampedLock and directly dispatches all methods to analogs in StampedLock.
    YieldWaitStrategy
    This implementation of WaitStrategy just spins calling Thread.yield() between tests of a condition.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConcurrentRateMeterConfig.Mode
    A mode of RateMeter.
